Unless otherwise speciﬁed, a Special Summoned monster is played onto the ﬁeld in your choice of face-up Attack Position or face-up Defense Position. • Special Summon with a Card’s Effect Monsters can also be Special Summoned onto the ﬁeld through the effect of another card. This is different from “Special Summon Monsters.” You cannot use a card effect to Special Summon those monsters from your hand, Deck, or the Graveyard unless it was properly Special Summoned ﬁrst.
